column4: What do I need to install to handle the streams's mime type audio/mpeg in rythmbox?
cat: /proc/pci: No such file or directory??? I just want to know what driver is installed for my ATI Radeon 9000 (ubuntu 5.04).
I am reading the HowTo for installing the gflrx driver http://ubuntulinux.org/wiki/BinaryDriverHowto
